name: Terroristic threatening in the second degree Coercion
text:
Terroristic threatening in the second degree.  (1)  A person commits the offense of terroristic threatening in the second degree if the person commits terroristic threatening other than as provided in section 707-716.
	(2)  Terroristic threatening in the second degree is a misdemeanor. [L 1979, c 184, pt of §1(2); gen ch 1993]
